join: inventor left outer join patent_inventor on inventor.inventor_id=patent_inventor.inventor_id
left outer join inventor_rawinventor on inventor_rawinventor.inventor_id = inventor.inventor_id and inventor_rawinventor.patent_id = patent_inventor.patent_id
left outer JOIN location_inventor on inventor.inventor_id=location_inventor.inventor_id left outer join location as locationI on location_inventor.location_id=locationI.location_id

left outer join assignee_entity on patent_inventor.patent_id=assignee_entity.patent_id left outer join assignee_inventor on patent_inventor.inventor_id=assignee_inventor.inventor_id and assignee_entity.assignee_key_id=assignee_inventor.assignee_id

left outer join patent_inventor as copatent_inventor on copatent_inventor.patent_id=patent_inventor.patent_id and copatent_inventor.inventor_id<>patent_inventor.inventor_id left outer join inventor as coinventor on copatent_inventor.inventor_id=coinventor.inventor_id left outer join location_inventor as location_coinventor on coinventor.inventor_id=location_coinventor.inventor_id left outer join location as locationCO on location_coinventor.location_id=locationCO.location_id left outer join inventor_coinventor on inventor.inventor_id=inventor_coinventor.inventor_id and coinventor.inventor_id=inventor_coinventor.coinventor_id
left outer join ipcr on patent_inventor.patent_id=ipcr.patent_id

left outer join uspc_entity on patent_inventor.patent_id=uspc_entity.patent_id left outer join inventor_uspc_mainclass on inventor.inventor_id=inventor_uspc_mainclass.inventor_id and uspc_entity.uspc_mainclass_id=inventor_uspc_mainclass.mainclass_id

left outer join cpc_entity_type_2 as cpc_entity on patent_inventor.patent_id=cpc_entity.patent_id left outer join inventor_cpc_group on inventor.inventor_id=inventor_cpc_group.inventor_id and cpc_entity.cpc_group_id=inventor_cpc_group.group_id

left outer join nber_entity on patent_inventor.patent_id=nber_entity.patent_id left outer join inventor_nber_subcategory on inventor.inventor_id=inventor_nber_subcategory.inventor_id and nber_entity.nber_subcategory_id=inventor_nber_subcategory.subcategory_id

left outer JOIN patent as patent_year on patent_inventor.patent_id=patent_year.patent_id left outer join inventor_year on inventor.inventor_id=inventor_year.inventor_id and patent_year.year=inventor_year.patent_year

left outer join government_interest on patent_inventor.patent_id=government_interest.patent_id left outer join patent_govintorg on patent_inventor.patent_id=patent_govintorg.patent_id left outer join patent_contractawardnumber on patent_inventor.patent_id=patent_contractawardnumber.patent_id left outer join government_organization on patent_govintorg.organization_id=government_organization.organization_id
